text.name: system_description
text.text: LowRes NX was inspired by real 8- and 16-bit systems and simulates chips for graphics, sound and I/O, which actually work like classic hardware.
LowRes NX se inspira en sistemas reales de 8 y 16 bits y simula chips para gráficos, sonido, procesadores... etc para funcionar como el hardware clásico.
